data.message: My love please come here! I was 10 when i start listening to ya! I'm fuckin 27!Come in Italy please!

replies.message:
Oh shit...it's that really you?????
I'm screaming like an idiot for a fuckin thumbs up!
...Can you Imagine my reaction if one day i'll ever meet you!?probably not.. cause i'm on the opposite side of the world!!

 But really bro.. you  mean so much to me.
I started listening, translating and rapping with you. 
If today i'm an ENG interpreter it's also because of you. 
You're a piece of my Life.
I'm italian but i've been  abroad few times..  everywhere i've been they were like: oh god you've been studying  english in America? Where did you learn It? You're Amazing.

And me was like: 
nope, Eminem. Since 1998 or more.
I fucking love you.
 I would do anything Just to talk to you and hug you.
Sincerly yours.
PS. We should Be together too. 
I'll be waiting for you in Italy.
Sabrina.
